tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE phishing_email_templates (
    template_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    template_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    template_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    target_group VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    created_by_user VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE template_targets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    template_id INT,
    target_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES phishing_email_templates(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES email_targets(id)
);

CREATE TABLE phishing_templates (
    template_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    template_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    template_content TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE targets (
    target_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address TEXT NOT NULL,
    target_name TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE template_mapping (
    mapping_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    template_id UUID NOT NULL,
    target_id UUID NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES phishing_templates(template_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES targets(target_id)
)

CREATE TABLE distribution_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mapping_id UUID NOT NULL,
    sent_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    delivery_status TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (mapping_id) REFERENCES template_mapping(mapping_id)
)

CREATE TABLE template_targets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    template_id INT,
    target_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES phishing_templates(template_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES targets(target_id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_templates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    template_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES phishing_templates(template_id)
);
